name: IncorpoScape: Demo
description:
BUY FULL VERSION

A high-tech prison cell will be used to incarcerate the most notorious criminals.
To ensure the success of our system, we need your help to put it to the test!

As the tester, you will be put to the ultimate challenge as you navigate through the treacherous and highly-secured environment of this maximum-security prison. 

Your mission is to collect points while avoiding the dangerous laser beams that are constantly moving higher and higher. Use your wits and quick reflexes to climb to new heights on levitating boards and carefully test cameras to ensure everything is functioning properly. But be warned, this is not for the faint of heart! The prison is full of traps and obstacles designed to thwart your progress at every turn. 

Will you be able to survive this ultimate test of your skills and intellect? With stunning graphics and addictive gameplay, this game will keep you on the edge of your seat for hours on end. So what are you waiting for? Take the ultimate challenge and become the master of the high-tech prison cell simulator!

As you progress, new boards will be unlocked for you to test! Which will be your favourite?
